original_text: Then Joshua and all Israel with him moved on from Lachish to Eglon; they took up positions against it and attacked it.
korean_text: 여호수아가 온 이스라엘과 더불어 라기스에서 에글론으로 나아가서 대진하고 싸워

sentences.original_text: Then Joshua and all Israel with him moved on from Lachish to Eglon
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여호수아와 그와 함께한 모든 이스라엘은 라기스에서 에글론으로 이동했으며

sentences.original_text: they took up positions against it
